Passive Effect: Only spawns from the ancestor sword.
Description: This ancestor is angered that Sweeper abused the Ancestor Sword.
Bats flutter about in dark places, in a mostly harmless manner.
A rampaging, lunging whirlwind of thick fur and sharp teeth and red, red eyes.
A massive creature of scales, muscle, and sharp glaring eyes.

Passive Effect: Able to walk on unrevealed tiles.
Description: How'd you get down here?  Go away, kitty
Cultists are crazed humans, sworn to protect and serve the Tyrant.
This cultist has struggled to the top of the Tyrant's dire ladder, and gained the strength necessary to lead.
A badger is a fierce little animal - oh, wait.  Maybe not that little.

Passive Effect: Has a 5% chjance on hit to apply poison.
Description: Rats have thrived down here, and grown large and strong.

Passive Effect: Has a 25% chance on hit to apply poison.
Description: These underground snakes have somehow grown to the size of humans.

Passive Effect: Has a 25% chance on hit to apply stiff.
Description: Ghouls are lost humans, on the very threshold of the undead world.
Grunts are dull-witted monsters that trod towards the nearest enemy, then thump away.
It's not as big an advantage as you'd think.

Passive Effect: May only attack every other turn.
Description: A giant mechanical stomper of a creature - slow, but unstoppable.

Passive Effect: Has a 25% chance on hit to apply anemia.
Description: A tiny insect, mostly harmless; but sometimes it carries disease.
The Reaper is a powerful, relentless spirit, who chases the dawdling and idling.
A sentry doesn\'t move, but protects its space aggressively from any passers-by.
Being nothing but bones, a rattling old skeleton is its own armor.

Passive Effect: Has a 15% chance on hit to discard player's weapon.
Description: A liquid body shrugs off swords, and energy blasts - humble, but difficult to kill.

Passive Effect: Has a 25% chance on hit to remove player experience.

Passive Effect: May only attack every other turn.
Description: The whirling, animated sword advances - slowly, but surely.

Description: Zombies are slow, shuffling, and weak.. but they are almost never alone.
